Html:
Hi,

I have made one command using Prism's DelegateCommand.

But it doesn't requery the CanExecution function it executes it only once.

How to make DelegateCommand to requery the CanExecute funciton ?

Thanks

Ashish

Hi Ashsih,

When you create an instance of a DelegateCommand, you have two overloads of the constructor; one that accepts an Execute delegate, and one that accepts both an Execute and a CanExecute delegates as parameters.

You might find more information about this here.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
